features.name: Hello, World!
features.description: a full program that displays "Hello, World!"

features.name: String to Integer
features.description: converts string mystr into an integer

features.name: Integer to String
features.description: converts integer myint into a string

features.name: String to Float
features.description: converts string mystr into a floating point number

features.name: Float to String
features.description: converts floating point number myfloat into a string

features.name: Float to Integer
features.description: converts floating point number myfloat into an integer

features.name: String Length
features.description: return number of characters in string

features.name: String Comparison
features.description: check if string variables a and b are the same string

features.name: Lower Case
features.description: convert string str to lower case

features.name: Upper Case
features.description: convert string str to upper case

features.name: Concatenate
features.description: join string a and b into a single string

features.name: Substring
features.description: retrieve characters start thru end (or length) of string str

features.name: Index of Substring
features.description: find out what position a substring mysubstring is within a string str

features.name: Trim
features.description: removes whitespace from the start and end of the string

features.name: Replace
features.description: replace all occurrences of a substring with another string

features.name: Split on String
features.description: split a string str into multiple strings wherever a delimiter string delim is found

features.name: Split on Regex
features.description: split a string str into multiple strings wherever a delimiter regex myregex matches

features.name: Join
features.description: joins elements in array myarray into a single string, joined by delimiter string delim

features.name: Regex Match
features.description: returns whether or not a given regex myregex matches in a string str

features.name: Regex Find
features.description: find all the matches to a regex myregex in a string str

features.name: Regex Replace
features.description: replaces all regex myregex matches in string str with a replacement template tmpl (containing placeholders $1, $2 etc)

features.name: Floor
features.description: rounds down float myfloat to the nearest integer below the decimal

features.name: Ceiling
features.description: rounds up float myfloatto the nearest integer below the decimal

features.name: Round
features.description: rounds float myfloat to the nearest integer to the decimal, up or down

features.name: Fraction Part
features.description: finds the fraction part of the decimal number mynum

features.name: Random
features.description: returns a random number

features.name: Min
features.description: finds the minimum value in the array myarray

features.name: Max
features.description: finds the maximum value in the array myarray

features.name: Date Object
features.description: get an object representing the current date and time

features.name: Timestamp
features.description: get time in milliseconds from date object mydate

features.name: Format
features.description: format date mydate into a string using format specifier myformat (details on format specifier in the API docs)

features.name: Parse
features.description: parse a string $datestring into a date object

features.name: Compare
features.description: determine if date a is equal to, earlier than, or later than date b

features.name: Offset
features.description: alter the date mydate by a fixed interval

features.name: Define Array
features.description: creates a new array from static values

features.name: Define Associative Array
features.description: creates a new associative array from static values

features.name: Array Length
features.description: return the number of elements in array myarray (a.k.a. size, count)

features.name: Get
features.description: get an element from an array

features.name: Get Associative
features.description: get an element from an associative array

features.name: Set
features.description: set an element in an array

features.name: Set Associative
features.description: set an element in an associative array

features.name: Push
features.description: add value myval onto end of array myarray

features.name: Pop
features.description: remove value from end of array myarray and return it

features.name: Merge
features.description: join array a and b into a single array with all the elements of each

features.name: Slice
features.description: retrieve elements start through end (or length) of array myarray

features.name: For Each
features.description: execute code for each element in array myarray, setting the variable myval to each element

features.name: For Each Associative
features.description: execute code for each element in array myarray, setting the variable myval to each value and mykey to the corresponding key

features.name: Keys
features.description: get all keys in associative array myarray

features.name: Values
features.description: get all values in associative array myarray

features.name: Contains
features.description: returns true if array myarray contains value val

features.name: Index Of
features.description: returns the index of first instance of value val in array myarray

features.name: Filter
features.description: returns all elements in array myarray for which closure mycond returns true

features.name: Map
features.description: create a new array by running code on each value val of original array myarray

features.name: Reduce
features.description: loops through values val in array myarray, using a function to apply it to a single resulting value, starting with initial value myinitial

features.name: Sort
features.description: sorts values in myarray by running a comparison function

features.name: Reverse
features.description: reverses the order of the array elements

features.name: Define
features.description: define a function myfunc with integer arguments arg1 and arg2, returning an integer

features.name: Call
features.description: call a function myfunc passing in arguments val1 and val2

features.name: Default Arguments
features.description: allows default values to be set for some arguments, so they do not need to be passed in

features.name: N Arguments
features.description: allow a variable number of arguments

features.name: Named Arguments
features.description: clarify arguments with names

features.name: Overloading
features.description: define multiple functions with the same name but different arguments

features.name: Define Closure
features.description: create an anonymous function (a.k.a. a block), which can't be called by name but is instead stored in a variable

features.name: Call Closure
features.description: call an anonymous function stored in a variable

features.name: Define Class
features.description: define a class with variables and methods

features.name: Instantiate Class
features.description: create a new instance of a class

features.name: Instance Of
features.description: indicate whether object myobj is of class MyClass (or a descendant of it)

features.name: Exact Instance Of
features.description: indicate whether object myobj is of class MyClass (not including descendants of it)

features.name: Class Of
features.description: gets the class or class name of an object

features.name: Define Field
features.description: define a member variable/instance variable/property/attribute/field on a class

features.name: Access Field
features.description: access a field on an object

features.name: Has Field
features.description: whether or not an object has a certain field

features.name: Define Method
features.description: define a member function/method/procedure on a class

features.name: Call Method
features.description: call a method on an object

features.name: Has Method
features.description: whether or not an object has a certain metohd

features.name: This
features.description: refer to the current object within a method

features.name: Define Constant
features.description: defines a constant value for a class

features.name: Access Constant
features.description: accesses a constant value for a class

features.name: Define Class Field
features.description: defines a field shared across all instances of a class (sometimes known as a static field)

features.name: Access Class Field
features.description: access a field on a class (sometimes known as a static field)

features.name: Define Class Method
features.description: define a method called on a class, not an instance of it (sometimes known as a static method)

features.name: Call Class Method
features.description: call a method on a class (sometimes known as a static method)

features.name: Constructor
features.description: define a method called when the class is instantiated, to set it up

features.name: Inheritance
features.description: Define a subclass of a parent class, inheriting its variables and methods

features.name: Parent Method
features.description: call the parent class's version of a method

features.name: Declare Public
features.description: declare a field or method to be accessible from anywhere

features.name: Declare Protected
features.description: declare a field or method to be accessible only from this class, parent, and child classes

features.name: Declare Private
features.description: declare a field or method to be accessible only from this class

features.name: Declare Final
features.description: declare that a method cannot be overridden by child classes

features.name: Declare Interface
features.description: declare a set of methods a class will provide without implementing them

features.name: Implement Interface
features.description: define a class that implements the method an interface declares

features.name: Abstract Class
features.description: declare a class that provides some functionality but leaves other functionality for child classes to implement, and therefore cannot be instantiated itself

features.name: Output
features.description: outputs data to the client

features.name: GET Data
features.description: retrieve a GET (query string) field

features.name: POST Data (Form)
features.description: retrieve a POST (form) field

features.name: POST Data (Raw)
features.description: retrieve the raw POST data, i.e. if it is JSON or XML

features.name: Uploaded File
features.description: get info and data for an uploaded file

features.name: Get Cookie
features.description: retrieves a cookie sent by the client

features.name: Set Cookie
features.description: sets a cookie to be sent to the client

features.name: Get Header
features.description: gets a request header sent from the client

features.name: Set Header
features.description: sets a response header to be sent to the client

features.name: Status Code
features.description: sets the status code returned

features.name: Content Type
features.description: sets the content type header

features.name: Redirect
features.description: redirect to another URL

features.name: Get Session Var
features.description: retrieves a variable from the session

features.name: Set Session Var
features.description: sets a variable in the session

features.name: Remove Session Var
features.description: removes a variable from the session

features.name: Get Flash Var
features.description: retrieves a variable from the flash (storage over one request)

features.name: Set Flash Var
features.description: sets a variable in the flash (storage over one request)

features.name: Keep Flash Var
features.description: preserves the variable in the flash for an additional request

features.name: Simple Request
features.description: send a simple GET request

features.name: Full Request
features.description: send an HTTP request with all configuration parameters

features.name: Validate
features.description: validate data, redisplaying it with errors if any (depending on the tool, it may validate post data, a model object, or any data set)

features.name: Custom Validator
features.description: create a validator that validates using code you provide

features.name: Required
features.description: validates that the field is not empty or blank

features.name: Required If
features.description: validates that the field is not empty or blank, only if a certain other condition is met

features.name: Required With
features.description: validates that the field is not empty or blank if another field is not blank

features.name: Required Without
features.description: validates that the field is not empty or blank if any of a set of other fields is blank

features.name: Required Without All
features.description: validates that the field is not empty or blank if all of a set of other fields is blank

features.name: Required to be Absent
features.description: validates that the field is empty or blank

features.name: Required From Group
features.description: at least n fields in the group must be filled in

features.name: Min Length
features.description: validates that the field has at least n characters

features.name: Max Length
features.description: validates that the field has at most n characters

features.name: Range Length
features.description: validates that the field has between m and n characters

features.name: Exact Length
features.description: validates that the field has exactly n characters

features.name: Phone
features.description: validates that the field contains a valid phone number

features.name: Date
features.description: validates that the field contains a valid date

features.name: Date of Format
features.description: validates that the field contains a date in a certain format

features.name: Before Date
features.description: validates that the field contains a date that is before a fixed date

features.name: After Date
features.description: validates that the field contains a date that is after a fixed date

features.name: Email
features.description: validates that the field contains a valid email address

features.name: Email List
features.description: validates that the field contains a comma-delimited list of valid email addresses

features.name: URL
features.description: validates that the field contains a valid URL (web address)

features.name: Active URL
features.description: validates that the field contains a valid URL with a domain name that is really in use

features.name: IP Address
features.description: validates that the field contains a valid IP address

features.name: Base64
features.description: validates that the field contains a valid base64 string

features.name: Alphabetic
features.description: validates that the field contains only letters

features.name: Alphanumeric
features.description: validates that the field contains only letters and numbers

features.name: Word Character
features.description: validates that the field contains only letters, numbers, hyphens, and underscores

features.name: Regex
features.description: validates that the field matches a given regular expression

features.name: Number
features.description: validates that the field contains a number (integer or decimal)

features.name: Number of Length
features.description: validates that the field contains a number of n digits

features.name: Number of Length Range
features.description: validates that the field contains a number of m to n digits

features.name: Integer
features.description: validates that the field contains an integer number (negative or positive)

features.name: Positive Integer
features.description: validates that the field contains an integer greater than or equal to 0

features.name: Non-Negative Integer
features.description: validates that the field contains a number greater than 0

features.name: Even
features.description: validates that the field contains an even integer

features.name: Odd
features.description: validates that the field contains an odd integer

features.name: Greater Than
features.description: validates that the field contains a number greater than a fixed number

features.name: Less Than
features.description: validates that the field contains a number less than a fixed number

features.name: Between
features.description: validates that the field contains a number between two fixed numbers

features.name: Credit Card
features.description: validates that the field contains a valid credit card number

features.name: Equals Field
features.description: validates that the field's value is the same as another field's

features.name: Does Not Equal Field
features.description: validates that the field's value is the different from another field's

features.name: Equals Value
features.description: validates that the field's value is equal to a fixed value

features.name: In List
features.description: validates that the field's value is in a fixed list of values

features.name: Not In List
features.description: validates that the field's value is not in a fixed list of values

features.name: Accepted
features.description: validates that the field's value is 'yes', 'on', or 1

features.name: Confirmed
features.description: validates that there is another field with the same name plus '_confirmation' at the end, with the same value

features.name: Exists in Database
features.description: validates that the value of this field exists in a certain database column

features.name: Does Not Exist in Database
features.description: validates that the value of this field does not exist in a certain database column; i.e. that it is unique

features.name: File Extension
features.description: validates that the file uploaded in this field has one of the given set of extensions

features.name: File is Image
features.description: validates that the file uploaded in this field is an image

features.name: File is Type
features.description: validates that the file uploaded in this field has one of the given set of MIME content types

features.name: File Size
features.description: validates that the file uploaded in this field has exactly the given size

features.name: File Min Size
features.description: validates that the file uploaded in this field has a size less than the given value

features.name: File Max Size
features.description: validates that the file uploaded in this field has a size greater than the given value

features.name: Validate Associated
features.description: runs validations on an associated model

features.name: Route
features.description: direct a URL to a specific controller action

features.name: Controller Action
features.description: run code for a given URL

features.name: Render View
features.description: generate output to send to the client

features.name: URL
features.description: returns a URL to a route within the application

features.name: Output Form Element
features.description: outputs HTML for a form element, with initial data and validation errors, if any

features.name: Validate
features.description: validate submitted form data, redisplaying it with errors if any

features.name: Log
features.description: write to a log file
